body_content.explanation: to put a computer program back onto a computer:
examples: I had to reinstall the operating system.
You will need to re-install the program to get the latest version.

body_content.explanation: to put furniture, a machine, a piece of equipment, etc. back into the position that it was in before and make it ready for use:
examples: The mechanic was able to reinstall the pistons without damaging the engine.
They intend to re-install the fittings to match the original design.

body_content.explanation: to put someone back into an important job or position:
examples: The new owners have plans to reinstall Sykes as chief executive.
Her supporters want to reinstall her as president.
